mapper.insert: INSERT INTO battery_signal (vid, cid, battery_type, mx, mi, ix, ii, signal_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{vid}, #{cid}, #{batteryType}, #{mx}, #{mi}, #{ix}, #{ii}, #{signalTime}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM battery_signal WHERE cid = #{cid} ORDER BY signal_time DESC LIMIT 1
